title: Brigitte Nielsen, 56, shows off her decolletage as she plays with daughter Frida in the park
text:
Brigitte Nielsen was spotted enjoying a day at a park with her husband Mattia Dessi, 40, on Wednesday

The couple appeared happy as they doted on their little girl Frida, aged 15 months, and the family dog.

The 56-year-old actress, who stands a statuesque 6ft1in, showed off her decolletage in a low-cut black tank top, black velvet pants with a discreet pattern of raised material and black boots.

Making a run for it: Proud parents Brigitte Nielsen and Mattia Dessi couldn't help smiling as their toddler Frida wobbled around on the grass in a park in Los Angeles on Wednesday

Mattia, a former model who hails from Italy, donned a black, long-sleeved T-shirt and grey jogging pants with a purple stripe down the side and white sneakers.

He squatted down to play with their daughter.

The little darling looked adorable in a blue top with a pattern of white fluffy clouds and pink leggings with matching pink bootees.

The toddler, who has a shock of raven black hair like her dad, unlike her mom's white blonde hair, ran up and down as her proud parents looked on.

Mommy's girl: The toddler, who has a shock of raven black hair like her dad, unlike her mom's white blonde hair, ran back to Brigitte

The couple met at a hotel in Lugano, Switzerland, where Mattia was a waiter and they tied the knot in Malta on July 8, 2006, making Mattia Brigitte's fifth husband.

Meanwhile, the actress has already raised four sons from three previous relationships. She shares musician and composer Julian Winding, 35, with her first husband Kasper Winding, 63.

Killian Nielsen, 28, is her son with her former beau, pro-football player Mark Gastineau, 62. She had Raoul Meyer Jr., 24, and Douglas Meyer, 26, with actor Raoul Meyer, 59, to whom she was married from 1993 to 2005.

She's rolling: Brigitte left the nanny to deal with Frida and her stroller as she walked back up the grassy hill

Brigitte was no doubt delighted when her fifth baby, who was reportedly delivered by cesarean, turned out to be a girl. She conceived her youngest child through in vitro fertilization, after freezing her eggs when she was 40.

The actress, who hails from Denmark, shot to fame in Red Sonja with Arnold Schwarzenegger and Rocky IV with Sylvester Stallone, both released in 1985.

She recently reprized her Rocky role as Ludmilla Drago in 2018's Creed II.

And Brigitte was a guest co-host on The Talk for 11 episodes between May to October this year.
description: She's the happy mom of a 15-months-old daughter. And the actress, 56,  was spotted enjoying an afternoon of family fun with  her handsome husband, 40, and their little girl in a park in LA on Wednesday.
